parameters.name: based-on
parameters.description: Procedure that caused this media to be created

parameters.name: operator
parameters.description: The person who generated the image

parameters.name: patient
parameters.description: Who/What this Media is a record of

parameters.name: status
parameters.description: preparation | in-progress | not-done | on-hold | stopped | completed | entered-in-error | unknown

parameters.name: subject
parameters.description: Who/What this Media is a record of

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: Classification of media as image, video, or audio

parameters.name: view
parameters.description: Imaging view, e.g. Lateral or Antero-posterior

info.description: A photo, video, or audio recording acquired or used in healthcare. The actual content may be inline or provided by direct reference
info.title: FHIR R4 Media Resource

Media.description: A photo, video, or audio recording acquired or used in healthcare. The actual content may be inline or provided by direct reference

basedOn.description: A procedure that is fulfilled in whole or in part by the creation of this media.

bodySite.description: Indicates the site on the subject's body where the observation was made (i.e. the target site).

content.description: The actual content of the media - inline or by direct reference to the media source file.

created[x].description: The date and time(s) at which the media was collected.

device.description: The device used to collect the media.

deviceName.description: The name of the device / manufacturer of the device  that was used to make the recording.

duration.description: The duration of the recording in seconds - for audio and video.

encounter.description: The encounter that establishes the context for this media.

height.description: Height of the image in pixels (photo/video).

implicitRules.description: A set of rules under which this content was created

issued.description: Date/Time this version was made available

language.description: The base language in which the resource is written.

note.description: Comments made about the media by the performer, subject or other participants.

operator.description: The person who administered the collection of the image.

partOf.description: A larger event of which this particular event is a component or step.

reasonCode.description: Describes why the event occurred in coded or textual form.

subject.description: Who/What this Media is a record of.

text.description: Text summary of the resource, for human interpretation

type.description: Classification of media as image, video, or audio

view.description: The name of the imaging view e.g. Lateral or Antero-posterior (AP).

width.description: Width of the image in pixels (photo/video).

display.description: Plain text narrative that identifies the resource in addition to the resource reference.

identifier.description: Logical reference, when literal reference is not known

reference.description: Literal reference, Relative, internal or absolute URL

coding.description: A reference to a code defined by a terminology system.

text.description: Plain text representation of the concept

implicitRules.description: A set of rules under which this content was created

language.description: The base language in which the resource is written.

contentType.description: Mime type of the content, with charset etc.

creation.description: The date that the attachment was first created.

data.description: The actual data of the attachment - a sequence of bytes, base64 encoded.

hash.description: The calculated hash of the data using SHA-1. Represented using base64.

language.description: The human language of the content. The value can be any valid value according to BCP 47.

size.description: The number of bytes of data that make up this attachment (before base64 encoding, if that is done).

title.description: A label or set of text to display in place of the data.

url.description: A location where the data can be accessed.

end.description: End time with inclusive boundary, if not ongoing

start.description: The start of the period. The boundary is inclusive.

url.description: Source of the definition for the extension code - a logical name or a URL.

period.description: Time period during which identifier is/was valid for use.

system.description: The namespace for the identifier value

lastUpdated.description: When the resource last changed - e.g. when the version changed.

profile.description: Profiles this resource claims to conform to

security.description: Security Labels applied to this resource

source.description: Identifies where the resource comes from

author[x].description: The individual responsible for making the annotation.

text.description: The text of the annotation in markdown format.

time.description: Indicates when this particular annotation was made.

div.description: The actual narrative content, a stripped down version of XHTML.

code.description: Symbol in syntax defined by the system

display.description: A representation of the meaning of the code in the system, following the rules of the system.

system.description: The identification of the code system that defines the meaning of the symbol in the code.

userSelected.description: If this coding was chosen directly by the user

version.description: Version of the system - if relevant
